textBox.richText: We have been receiving a tremendous number of requests for support for iWeb 2009. First, thank you all for the great feedback and the interest in a ‘09 update. Unfortunately, we are in the same situation all of you are. We cannot purchase iLife ’09 either until the end of January so we do not know how badly it is going to break iWeb Buddy. However, we will be supporting it shortly after it is released. We are considering one of two options at this point: 1. If the changes are minor then we will be updating iWeb Buddy to be compatible with ‘08 and ‘09 of iWeb. 2. If the changes are overly complicated then we will create a new version of iWeb Buddy that is compatible with iWeb ’09 and we will continue to support iWeb ’08 in the current iWeb Buddy. Once we have had a chance to review the new iLife we will be posting more information here. Trust me when I say that we will be picking up iLife ’09 as soon as it is available.
